segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s like she’s in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s kind of funny how focused she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before the stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to be shocked when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip on all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
